remarks: Property implying that a functional has a closed kernel.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lcfl9a.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfl9a.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl9a.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl9a.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcfl9a.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfl9a.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfl9a.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfl9a.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcfl9a.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lcfl9a.s $e |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` { X } ) C_ ( L ` G ) ) $.
lcfl9a $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) = ( L ` G ) ) $.
